name: Bubble Bobble Nostalgie Gold Edition
description:
Bubble Bobble Gold Edition is a Windows remake of the arcade-classic game "Bubble Bobble". Now you will enjoy nice HiColor graphics with transparency and particles effects, new music and sound. You will face new monsters like spiders, that can throw the webs, wizards, batiks and others. Moreover, the two Players Game for Bub and Bob cooperative will add much fun! There are 120+ additional items and bonuses, 10+ different monsters, 200 levels in Bubble Bobble Gold!

Bubble Bobble Gold Edition is a Shareware software in the category Miscellaneous developed by Alawar Entertainment&GameOverGames.

The latest version of Bubble Bobble Gold Edition is 2.5, released on 02/18/2008.

http://www.alawar.com/ (The game's page or any info does not exist anymore on the website of Alawar)
